text: Recommendation: Patients at risk (weight loss >10-15 % within 6 months, BMI < 18.5 kg/m?, and serum albumin <30 g/l in the absence of liver or renal dysfunction) should receive oral nutritional supplements for 7 days prior to surgery. For severely malnourished patients (>10 % WL), surgery should be postponed for at least 2 weeks to improve nutritional status and allow patients to gain weight. Evidence level: high Grade of recommendation: strong
